parameters.name: AlertId
parameters.description: The ID of the alert rule.

parameters.name: ContactGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the alert contact groups. The value must be a JSON array.

parameters.name: IsAutoStart
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the alert rule after it is created. Default value: `false`.

*   `true`: enables the alert rule.
*   `false`: disables the alert rule.

parameters.name: TemplageAlertConfig
parameters.description: The configurations of the alert template based on which you want to create an alert rule. The value must be a JSON string. You must set at least one of the **TemplateAlertId** and **TemplageAlertConfig** parameters. If you set both parameters, the **TemplateAlertId** parameter prevails. For more information about the TemplageAlertConfig parameter, see the following **additional information about the TemplageAlertConfig parameter**.
